item.title: How u make the iteams in the shop stay there?
item.dc:creator: @java1 -java-
item.description:
@java1 wrote:

open up shops.cfg in side ur source or server -same thing and u should see something like this

shop = 7	Zipposcape_staff_shop				2	2	6563	500	6575	5000	2415	500	2416	2000	2417	2000	1385	2	1387	2

thats an example 6575 i the item 5000 is the amount u want inside the store u can change the amounts n other things like wat items u want change 6575 to 6570 - fire cape
then compile and run ur server hope this helped

-java-

Read full topic
